title: Mind Over Magic: Create Your Ideal Magic School - Early Access Now Available on Steam! - Archyde
text: 2023-12-28 09:44:54 The new simulation game “Mind Over Magic” developed by Sparkypants and published by Klei Publishing is now open for early access on Steam. In this game, players will serve as the principal of a magic school and build a magic school from scratch. The ideal magic school. The gameplay of this game is similar to “Hypoxia”. In this fantasy magic world, players create a magic academy by arranging “rooms” and carry out the most important educational work to train students to explore underground mazes so that they can survive in the terrifying world. Survive the creatures. In “Mind Over Magic”, students need to study according to the schedule you set every day, and the teachers are also personally selected by you. As students delve into various magical subjects, they will gradually discover their true potential. The scenes of “Mind Over Magic” are presented in 3D, so the layout of each room and the battles between students and magical creatures, as well as ancient secrets, strange plants, mysterious potions, undead servants, etc. are all fantastic. The settings all come to life. Players who are interested in this game can purchase it on Steam for early access! 1703814460 #Steam #Academy #Dark #Magics #Mind #Magic #open #early #access #4Gamers
